metadata.title: CVE-2023-3922 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from8.15 before 16.2.8, all versions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.5, allversions starting from 16.4 before 16.4.1. It was possible to hijack somelinks and buttons on the GitLab UI to a malicious page.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
